event.title: covers Carter, Unicoi, and Washington counties and had a combined population of 200,966 as of 2013

data.event: Johnson City is the principal city of the Johnson City Metropolitan Statistical Area, which covers Carter, Unicoi, and Washington counties and had a combined population of 200,966 as of 2013.

event.title: built his cabin along Boone's Creek near Johnson City in 1769

data.event: William Bean, traditionally recognized as Tennessee's first settler, built his cabin along Boone's Creek near Johnson City in 1769.
